com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.audio

Class Mini2DxOpenALAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.audio.Mini2DxOpenALAudio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Audio

    public class Mini2DxOpenALAudio
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Audio
    Modified version of OpenALAudio to support sound completion events
